verses.verse: Thus all the work <WH4399> that Solomon <WH8010> wrought <WH6213> for the house <WH1004> of Jehovah <WH3068> was finished <WH7999>. And Solomon <WH8010> brought <WH935> in the things <WH6944> that David <WH1732> his father <WH1> had dedicated <WH6944>, even the silver <WH3701>, and the gold <WH2091>, and all the vessels <WH3627>, and put <WH5414> them in the treasuries <WH214> of the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>.

Then Solomon <WH8010> assembled <WH6950> the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478>, and all the heads <WH7218> of the tribes <WH4294>, the princes <WH5387> of the fathers <WH1>' houses of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, unto Jerusalem <WH3389>, to bring up <WH5927> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of Jehovah <WH3068> out of the city <WH5892> of David <WH1732>, which is Zion <WH6726>.
And all the men <WH376> of Israel <WH3478> assembled <WH6950> themselves unto the king <WH4428> at the feast <WH2282>, which was in the seventh <WH7637> month <WH2320>.
And all the elders <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478> came <WH935>: and the Levites <WH3881> took up <WH5375> the ark <WH727>;

and they brought up <WH5927> the ark <WH727>, and the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>, and all the holy <WH6944> vessels <WH3627> that were in the Tent <WH168>; these did the priests <WH3548> the Levites <WH3881> bring up <WH5927>.

And king <WH4428> Solomon <WH8010> and all the congregation <WH5712> of Israel <WH3478>, that were assembled <WH3259> unto him <WH6440>, were before the ark <WH727>, sacrificing <WH2076> sheep <WH6629> and oxen <WH1241>, that could not be counted <WH5608> nor numbered <WH4487> for multitude <WH7230>.

And the priests <WH3548> brought in <WH935> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of Jehovah <WH3068> unto its place <WH4725>, into the oracle <WH1687> of the house <WH1004>, to the most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> place <WH3671>, even under the wings of the cherubim <WH3742>.

For the cherubim <WH3742> spread forth <WH6566> their wings <WH3671> over the place <WH4725> of the ark <WH727>, and the cherubim <WH3742> covered <WH3680> the ark <WH727> and the staves <WH905> thereof above <WH4605>.

And the staves <WH905> were so long <WH748> that the ends <WH7218> of the staves <WH905> were seen <WH7200> from the ark <WH727> before <WH6440> the oracle <WH1687>; but they were not seen <WH7200> without <WH2351>: and there it is unto this day <WH3117>.

There was nothing in the ark <WH727> save the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> which Moses <WH4872> put <WH5414> there at Horeb <WH2722>, when Jehovah <WH3068> made <WH3772> a covenant with the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, when they came out <WH3318> of Egypt <WH4714>.

And it came to pass <WH3548>, when the priests were come out <WH3318> of the holy <WH6944> place <WH3548>, (for all the priests that were present <WH4672> had sanctified <WH6942> themselves <WH8104>, and did not keep their courses <WH4256>;

also the Levites <WH3881> who were the singers <WH7891>, all of them <WH623>, even Asaph, Heman <WH1968>, Jeduthun <WH3038>, and their sons <WH1121> and their brethren <WH251>, arrayed <WH3847> in fine linen <WH948>, with cymbals <WH4700> and psalteries <WH5035> and harps <WH3658>, stood <WH5975> at the east end <WH4217> of the altar <WH4196>, and with them a hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> priests <WH3548> sounding <WH2690> with trumpets <WH2689>;)

it came to pass <WH2690>, when the trumpeters and singers <WH7891> were as one <WH259>, to make one <WH259> sound <WH6963> to be heard <WH8085> in praising <WH1984> and thanking <WH3034> Jehovah <WH3068>; and when they lifted up <WH7311> their voice <WH6963> with the trumpets <WH2689> and cymbals <WH4700> and instruments <WH3627> of music <WH7892>, and praised <WH1984> Jehovah <WH3068>, saying <WH2896>, For he is good; for his lovingkindness <WH2617> endureth for ever <WH5769>; that then the house <WH1004> was filled <WH4390> with a cloud <WH6051>, even the house <WH1004> of Jehovah <WH3068>,

so that the priests <WH3548> could <WH3201> not stand <WH5975> to minister <WH8334> by reason <WH6440> of the cloud <WH6051>: for the glory <WH3519> of Jehovah <WH3068> filled <WH4390> the house <WH1004> of God <WH430>.
